NoMsg
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, wouldn't you enjoy using
Multiplayer Mode to interact with
farmers living in other places?
NoMsg
Yes, I want to use Multiplayer Mode!
No, my own farm keeps me busy enough...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're such an eager beaver!
I was hoping you'd feel that way!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
.........
That's true, you're not ready for that
yet! You can't fool the Harvest Goddess!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First of all, I'll show you how to play
in Multiplayer Mode.
<PAGE>
Start by choosing Multiplayer Mode from
the </RED>title screen</RED>.
<PAGE>
To get to Multiplayer Mode while
farming, save to the <RED>diary</RED> and
return to the title screen.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm?
Where are we, you ask?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the <BLUE>Multiplayer Plaza</BLUE>, <MYNAME>!
It's a very different place from the
world where you live your everyday life!
<PAGE>
There are <BLUE>two</BLUE> main things
you can do at the Multiplayer Plaza.
<PAGE>
Cooperate with remote players to
<RED>raise the animals you brought here</RED>,
and <RED>exchange items</RED>.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll have Aaron explain the details.
Take it away, Aaron!♪

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever you and your friends are
playing here in the Multiplayer Plaza,
I'll be here.
<PAGE>
If you want to access tools or items,
or quit Multiplayer Mode, just come and
talk to me.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, <MYNAME>, I'm ready to explain all
the different things you can do in
Multiplayer Mode.
<PAGE>
Which would you like to hear about?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<SPEED_IMME>What do you want to know?
How to start in Multiplayer Mode
How Multiplayer Mode is different
What you can do in Multiplayer Mode
How to quit Multiplayer Mode
Next
Exchanging items
Raising animals
Using the warehouse
Back
Enough!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To enter <RED>Multiplayer Mode</RED> while
farming, save to the <RED>diary</RED> and
return to the title screen.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But keep this in mind: You <RED>can't
enter Multiplayer Mode</RED> unless you
have an item or animal with you.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First you have to choose which
Multiplayer Mode you want to use.
<PAGE>
The three choices are <BLUE>local multiplayer</BLUE>,
<BLUE>internet multiplayer</BLUE> and
<BLUE>internet multiplayer with a friend.</BLUE>
<PAGE>
Once you've chosen a mode, you can
either <BLUE>create a room</BLUE> or
<BLUE>find a room</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Create a room</BLUE> to invite
other players to join you.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Find a room</BLUE> will let you
join other players.
<PAGE>
You can have up to four players in a
room in Multiplayer Mode. Have fun
with other players!

<BLUE>Local multiplayer</BLUE> lets you
play with nearby friends.
<PAGE>
<BLUE>Internet multiplayer</BLUE> lets you play
with faraway players, including people
you don't know.
<PAGE>
And <BLUE>internet multiplayer with a friend</BLUE>
is for playing with faraway players who
are on your <RED>friend list</RED>.
<PAGE>
That last mode ensures you only play
with friends on your friend list, and
nobody else.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In Multiplayer Mode, you can <RED>exchange
items</RED>, <RED>raise animals</RED>,
and do <RED>actions</RED>.
<PAGE>
<RED>Exchange items</RED> lets you trade an item
you have for an item someone else has.
<PAGE>
<RED>Raise animals</RED> lets you
cooperate to raise animals brought by
all the players.
<PAGE>
<RED>Actions</RED> are how you communicate
with other players. Select from the
bottom screen while in Multiplayer Mode.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You have four actions to choose from:
<BLUE>Happy</BLUE>, <BLUE>Gesture</BLUE>, <BLUE>Rub Eyes</BLUE>, and <BLUE>Fold Arms</BLUE>.
Try them out!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To end your Multiplayer Mode session,
come talk to me and select <BLUE>Quit
Multiplayer Mode</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
You can't resume a session after
quitting, so make sure you finish your
animal care and interactions first.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you start Multiplayer Mode,
all players in the room <RED>must</RED>
exchange items.
<PAGE>
You must choose <BLUE>one</BLUE> item from your bag
or amenity from your studio inventory
to exchange.
<PAGE>
You never know what you'll get from
others in exchange. That's part of the
fun! Pick something others will like!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
But there are some items that the
Harvest Goddess has declared you are
<RED>forbidden to exchange</RED>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are those items? You'll have to
figure it out yourself.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In Multiplayer Mode, you can cooperate
to raise animals that each of the
players has brought.
<PAGE>
You can choose up to five animals:
<BLUE>Cows, sheep, alpacas, llamas, or yaks</BLUE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
But you <RED>cannot bring</RED> baby animals,
sick animals, or pregnant animals into
Multiplayer Mode.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's the key: The more players who are
cooperating, the faster you can develop
affection with the animals.
<PAGE>
Plus, animals that are brought into
Multiplayer Mode have their </RED>stress
reset to zero</RED>. So bring all kinds!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you come talk to me in Multiplayer
Mode, I will open the warehouse.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
From there you can access items in your
<BLUE>Storage, Refrigerator or Toolbox</BLUE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're a quick learner, <MYNAME>!
You'll be mastering Multiplayer Mode in
no time!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now you can use Multiplayer Mode to make
your life as a farmer better than ever!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alice and Aaron, please take <MYNAME>
back home now!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Leave it to us, Harvest Goddess!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're lucky we taught you all this
stuff! Now keep working hard on your
farm!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're going home now.
Bye-bye, <MYNAME>!
